about_the_game:
What seemed like a typical evening with a bit of hangover after a successful party gradually turned into one of the greatest mysteries Viktor had ever faced. With the help of the artificial intelligence ARNEAS (Artificial Neural Assistant), he traces the trail of unusual artifacts that suddenly captured the attention of the local treasure hunting community. And when he discovers that his own grandmother was likely involved in mysterious events fifty years ago, and begins receiving threatening messages from a cult of fanatic worshipers of executioner relics, he decides to get to the bottom of it all. Will he succeed in uncovering the secrets of the renowned executioner, dealing with the past, and saving his own future? Every decision could influence the ultimate fate.

Whispers of Prague is a modern first-person point-and-click adventure. Click on interactive points on the screen, collect and use items, examine mysterious inscriptions and ancient parchments. Gather important information through dialogue with dozens of characters you'll encounter on your journey. You are equipped with a backpack for item storage, a notebook with automatically recorded notes, and a cell phone that allows you to call your contacts, receive messages of all kinds (SMS, emails, analyses, and reports), or occasionally take pictures.

Never lose your progress! The game saves your position in three ways - autosave, quick save, and manual save into prepared slots. The game is also equipped with detailed help, including tips on how to proceed in case you get stuck in the story.

highlighted.name: Cat on a cold stone wall

detailed_description:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon HD 7950 or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 (Pascal) / AMD Radeon RX 460
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews:
“A polished P&C adventure set in the historical city of Prague. Featuring detailed environments and challenging puzzles, but be sure to give the game your undivided attention as it won't repeat itself!”
IndieGems
short_description: Classic first-person point-and-click adventure game set in contemporary Prague. As a programmer and treasure hunter, you embark on a long journey to uncover the secrets of the infamous Executioner. Your task will be complicated by a sect of fanatic cultists and your own unexplained heritage.
